WorkItem.ClosedComment: This was before the rewrite. Assume it isn't a problem anymore, but should be reopened if it does still exist.
WorkItem.Description:
Reported by nihlo here (http://rawr.codeplex.com/discussions/247735)
 
Here is a Screenshot of my Druid complete unbuffed with resto gear and talents:
 
http://img508.imageshack.us/i/wowscrnshot050311210243.jpg/
 
Here is my tree.xml also unbuffed:
 
http://www.file-upload.net/download-3405798/tree.xml.html
 
maybe the difference in mana comes from the different basemana of the druid-races ? or maybe you don't take the Leather Specialization (http://www.wowhead.com/spell=86530) into account ? or a some wrong data for Furor or Heart of the Wild ?
 
I hope this helps.

Comments.Message:
Screenshot reports 5607 Int, while Rawr gives 5547. Cannot yet place where the 60 int difference comes from.
My 1st guess is it might be due to interaction between leather bonus, heart of the wild (and maybe meta gem). At this stage they are treated additively, i.e. 11% total. If multiplicative, gives 11.3%, but not yet enough.

I think we need more testing with different equipped items (does leather bonus drop of when a slot is empty?) and testing stats untalented, might be able to pin-point the exact issue.
